results.title: Changes in weight, papilledema, headache, visual field, and life status in response to diet and metformin in women with idiopathic intracranial hypertension with and without concurrent polycystic ovary syndrome or hyperinsulinemia.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Papilledema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010211 @@@Papilledema@@@ significantly improved in the diet-alone group from 100% at baseline to 13% (P = 0.03), and in the @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@-@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ group from 95% to 30% (P = 0.002).

citations.NLM: Glueck CJ, Golnik KC, Aregawi D, Goldenberg N, Sieve L, Wang P. Changes in weight, papilledema, headache, visual field, and life status in response to diet and metformin in women with idiopathic intracranial hypertension with and without concurrent polycystic ovary syndrome or hyperinsulinemia. Transl Res. 2006 Nov;148(5):215-22. PMID: 17145568
